# isPortraitEffectSupported

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports the Portrait Effect feature.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPortraitEffectSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Enabling a Portrait Effect applies a shallow depth-of-field effect to objects in the background. See the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/isPortraitEffectEnabled] property of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] for more information.

## Determining Portrait Effects support

- **isPortraitEffectsMatteStillImageDeliverySupported**: A Boolean indicating whether the device supports portrait matte effects in still-image capture.
- **videoFrameRateRangeForPortraitEffect**: The range of frame rates available when Portrait Effect is active.
